headline: Are Options Traders Betting on a Big Move in Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Stock?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to Citizens Financial Group (CFG) stock based on the movements in the options market lately.

headline: Citizens Announces $2.6 Million in Financial Education Grants
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., April 01, 2025--To kick off April’s Financial Literacy Month, Citizens today announced $2.6 million in financial education grants and ongoing volunteer support to bolster programs that help students, individuals, and small business owners build the knowledge and confidence to own their financial futures. Support includes funding for the bank’s national financial education partners Junior Achievement (JA) and Council for Economic Education (CEE) as well as 132 local nonprofits a
